body:
Comment 1: 
GOHOME is not an environment variable that Go users. If you meant GOROOT, that isn't
needed either because it is hard coded into the /usr/local/go/bin/go tool.

The pkg installer should create a file

/etc/paths.d/go

could you please tell me if you have that file, and what its contents are.
_Status changed to **WaitingForReply**._
